QuestData.Title: Reignite the Wards
QuestData.Description:
The demons are weakening my defenses. They must be far more powerful than what we've faced before.
Will you help me to reignite the wards to keep the Legion from overrunning our position here?
QuestData.CompletionText: All of the wards need to be reignited if we're to hold the front.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. That will give us the breathing room we need to launch our counter-offensive.
